definition: to bridge/to put up a bridge
to support/frame/rack/framework/classifier for planes, large vehicles, radios etc

sentences.english: Yet others are still bridging to full consciousness.
sentences.chinese: 但其他的仍在向全意识架桥。

sentences.english: They are never active to do anything; they are just passive to pave road and build bridge for their members.
sentences.chinese: 他们从不主动做任何事，只是被动地为成员铺路架桥。

sentences.english: A HUGE cloud of dust rose and an overpass disappeared.
sentences.chinese: 一片巨大的灰尘腾空而起，一座高架桥瞬间消失了。

sentences.english: They build roads, houses, bridges, ships, pipelines, and canals.
sentences.chinese: 他们修路，盖房，架桥，造船，铺管道，挖运河。

sentences.english: Bridging flocculation is the most common particle aggregation mechanism in these processes.
sentences.chinese: 在这些工艺中架桥絮凝是最常见的颗粒凝聚机理。

sentences.english: Myocardial bridge is not an uncommon finding in routine diagnostic coronary angiography or pathological examination of the heart.
sentences.chinese: 心肌架桥在常规心导管或心脏之病理解剖中并不少见。

sentences.english: Counterpoised travelling bridge-erecting machine is used for the erection of roads and bridges.
sentences.chinese: 配重行走式架桥机是公路桥梁的架梁设备之一。

sentences.english: The paper introduced installation of plain girder by modified bridge girder erection equipment adopting double guide beam.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了改进式双导梁架桥机进行板梁安装。

sentences.english: The 64-type girders have been widely and successfully used as the guiding beams for bridge erectors.
sentences.chinese: 六四式军用梁用作架桥机导梁结构已取得巨大成功。

sentences.english: There was a railroad viaduct in Pilsen that was rumored to be haunted.
sentences.chinese: 皮尔森有一座铁路高架桥，传说常常闹鬼。

sentences.english: Coagent Selection For Peroxide-Cured Elastomers , from Sartomer Company, Inc. It is good for Peroxide-cured rubber compound design.
sentences.chinese: 美国沙多玛公司，过氧化物硫化共架桥剂选择资料。

sentences.english: Slant leg rigid frame bridge is a new bridge type which develops in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 无桥台斜腿刚架桥是近年发展起来的一种新桥型。

sentences.english: The intima of the bridged arterial segment is generally spared from atherosclerosis.
sentences.chinese: 心肌架桥处的血管内膜常可免于粥状硬化。

sentences.english: The three overpasses and the Olympic Central District will be lit up by the newly installed lights.
sentences.chinese: 这三座高架桥和奥运中心区将被新安装的景观灯照亮。

sentences.english: Viaduct accounts for 86 percent of the Pearl Line.
sentences.chinese: 摘要明珠线全长86%是高架桥。

sentences.english: Now the river has been bridged for the fourth time.
sentences.chinese: 现在这条河已在第四次架桥了。

definition: Zaoqiao or Tsaochiao township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
to pilot a ship/to channel water/to draw water (for irrigation)
to dig out/to excavate/to scoop out
Da Qiao, one of the Two Qiaos, according to Romance of the Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4], the two great beauties of ancient China
defensive structure/military fortifications/(Tw) construction works/civil engineering works
